amendment.description: To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Army, up to $500,000 for the United States Army Center of Military History to support a traveling exhibit on military experience in World War II.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4766 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4766 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S8599; text: CR S8599) To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Army, up to $500,000 for the United States Army Center of Military History to support a traveling exhibit on military experience in World War II.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4766 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4766 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Inouye.
